page.title: 02Local events in N.Duffield
page.content: {The Sponsored Walk}is an event that is held annually.The walk begins at the village green around 1.30pm taking you round a 5 mile radius of small villages and local places.Gradually working its way back round to the playing field.{ {Sportsday.}Again this is an annual event which takes place in June.Many of the villagers gather to see this competition. {The Village Tea }is held after the sportsday competition,during which medals and shields are awarded. {The Horticultural Show }is held fairly regularly in the village hall where home grown vegetables and flowers are put on display and prizes are won.
